extension.name: dd_speedtruck_109
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) DiabloDesign License All rights reserved.
extension.description:
DD SPEEDTRUCK 109 Free Version

  • Not for commercial!!! for commercial use, you must pay a special license (10 EURO)
    •
  • Buy template PRO version
    •  Buy Commercial license AMOUNT 10 €
  • Pełna wersja szablonu wyglądająca tak jak na demo kosztuje (40PLN Brutto).
  • Pełną wersję szablonu można kupić na naszej stronie internetowej.www.diablodesign.eu
    •

field.label: Aby uzyskać pełną wersję szablonu należy wykupić licencję.
For a complete version of the template, you need to purchase a license.

field.label: Dispalay Slideshow / turns on the position of the slideshow module

field.name: in3
field.default: It has been found that it is impossible to keep a foundation of loyal customers without a foundation of loyal employees. The best employees prefer to work for companies that provide the type of exceptional value that creates customer loyalty, thus, creating loyalty has become the toughest test for leadership.There have always been rumors and questions regarding the driving test. Here we look at one of those rumors and give an insight into how the driving test is conducted.
field.label: Text
